comments: Great way to stay on track with your thesis
I'm really happy I wrote a thesis, but there are obviously bumps along the way.
Jonathan is a wonderful thesis instructor. He is flexible (within reason) and gives excellent feedback. He makes himself accessible.
If you are AM/Ec considering writing a thesis, Econ 985 does a great job keeping you on track.

Jonathan is especially helpful for theory people. If you are writing a theory thesis and he is still teaching, choose him! Overall for 985 courses, pick based on the person who is teaching, not based on the topic the ec department assigns to it. These "topics" are often arbitrary and many people's thesis deviate from this. Use your 985 advisor for day to day structure, advice about how to navigate relationships with professors, and small-scale reading of thesis.
Jonathan was great. I would recommend 985 for any AM/Econ thesis writer.
